resources.string: During the game, the program displays a rectangular playing field - "glass", which fall one after the other bones. Player during the fall of the bone can move it left or right to rotate it relative to the center, and "dropping" it, instead of waiting until it reaches the bottom. The rate of fall of the bone depends on the number of points (increases after every hundred). Points are awarded to the player for a fully completed horizontal rows (15 points for a row).
Do you wish to continue your previous game?
Selecting \"NEW\" will erase your saved game.
Congratulations! \n Your result in the top 10!
Congratulations! \n You updated the result \n in the top 10!
